'''Pam''' is a [[shop]] [[NPC]] that can be found in [[Sumeru City]], [[Sumeru]]. She sells [[Cooking Ingredient|cooking ingredients]] and her stock refreshes every day, except for the [[Seagrass]].

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Pam:''' Care to buy some fresh fish? However you cook it, there's no better dish to complement your wine!
:{{DIcon|Shop}} What do you sell here?
::'''Pam:''' We sell seafood caught fresh every day, so you never have to worry about quality.
:;(Opens the shop menu)
:{{DIcon}} And you are...
::'''Pam:''' I'm a self-employed fishmonger. Running a small business means selling more for less.
::'''Pam:''' It's all about making the most of local resources.
::'''Pam:''' Getting fresh seafood and seagrass daily from the sea doesn't just fill our bellies, it keeps my family afloat, too.
::'''Pam:''' I can live a free life, and it's all thanks to the bounty of the sea.
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Pam:''' Take care. Remember to come back if you're ever looking to buy fresh seafood!
{{Dialogue End}}
